title: Please send them your reason of declination

options.value: Lacking of the necessary information needed for an exact answer.
The case needs a two-way communication before concluding with a proper diagnosis or best advice. Please make an adequate medical record on our system then make a voice or video CALL with our doctor.
Please come to the nearest medical center soon.
Type the reason / Or the name of Lab test and/or diagnostic image, etc., suggesting a tele-consultation
